solution_line_template: She reads {current_page}-{page_an_hour_ago}=<<{current_page}-{page_an_hour_ago}={pages_per_hour}>>{pages_per_hour} pages in an hour.
She needs to read {total_pages}-{current_page}=<<{total_pages}-{current_page}={remaining_pages}>>{remaining_pages} more pages.
For an additional {remaining_pages} pages, she will need {remaining_pages}/{pages_per_hour}=<<{remaining_pages}/{pages_per_hour}={hours_needed}>>{hours_needed} hours.
